plot: When an infamous criminal mastermind escapes prison, Toby and Michelle must recapture him before he seeks revenge.

After criminal mastermind Magnus Elphrenson pulls off an elaborate escape from prison, Michelle, Toby and the other IIB members are immediately on the case. Given the difficulty of staying ahead of the nefarious genius, who is rumoured to have a cache of millions, time is extremely limited. With Gregory Harrow, the man who raped and murdered his daughter, now dead, staying one step ahead of Magnus' plans is a challenge. Even Toby struggles for clarity on the man's thoughts. When Magnus leaves an ominous note for Michelle stating that he's planning vengeance, the team must battle against a possible conspiracy to figure out the target of his wrath.—Anonymous
